description:
"Let`s go for a drive, Shiki."
SolidS unit leader, producer, and composer who also does outside work Takamura Shiki is busier than usual in preparation for the end-of-year concert. Worried about their exhausted leader, Okui Tsubasa suggests the members of SolidS go for a nighttime drive. How far will they go?
Source: crunchyroll
